ygData.subject: Re: RE: [eqbards] Screenshots, some old - some new.
ygData.msgSnippet: Kisch is great for bards too ;o) -=B=- 27th and Slooooowly Climbing The Rathe ... From: Rosha Unca  To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Kisch is great for bards too ;o)

-=B=-
27th and Slooooowly Climbing
The Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Rosha Unca <captrosha@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, March 27, 2000 12:21 AM
Subject: Re: RE: [eqbards] Screenshots, some old - some new.


>From: "Rosha Unca" <captrosha@...>
>
>Hmm, how about a Kisch der Pavz? Looks like a Long Sword and procs
>Strong Poison. There is also some shield available in Paw. I
>haven't found it yet, but I haven't given up hope.
>
>Rosha Cristi, Bard
>Guild Leader, Legends
>Innoruuk
>
>--- In eqbards@onelist.com, Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@d...> wrote:
>
>> Anyone recommend a good shield and 1hs sword that looks like
>> something a shadowknight would use? (ie a long, longsword)
>>
>> Harmonic
